block.p: * Steven Landsberg and Jim Johnson were named to new positions at Wells Rich Greene BDDP, New York. Each will be a senior vice president and creative director. Mr. Landsberg was previously a senior vice president and associate creative director at Calet, Hirsch & Ferrell, New York, and Mr. Johnson was previously a creative director at Saatchi & Saatchi Advertising, New York.
